coordinates.name: Goal kick
coordinates.description: Pseudo-coordinate: overloaded with state context; goal-kick

coordinates.name: Goalkeeper with ball in the area
coordinates.description: Pseudo-coordinate: overloaded with situational context; need to distinguish between holding and playing

coordinates.name: Defender in the penalty area
coordinates.description: Situational context, assuming that an outfield player has the ball

coordinates.name: Defence
coordinates.description: Defending area centrally out of the penalty box

coordinates.name: Defence wings
coordinates.description: The wings of the whole defensive area ('covered' by penalty box and further)

coordinates.name: Defending midfield
coordinates.description: The central area between the defensive area and the half-way line

coordinates.name: Defending midfield, wings
coordinates.description: The lateral area between the defensive are and the half-way line

coordinates.name: Midfield
coordinates.description: The midfield central area between half-way line and attacking area

coordinates.name: Midfield, wings
coordinates.description: The midfield lateral area between half-way line and attacking area

coordinates.name: Attacking area
coordinates.description: Attacking area, central, out of penalty box

coordinates.name: Attacking area, wings
coordinates.description: The wings of attacking area, but not next to penalty box

coordinates.name: Attacking area, wings, advanced
coordinates.description: Attacking area, wings, next to penalty box

coordinates.name: Attacking area, wings of penalty box
coordinates.description: Inside the penalty box, lateral advanced position (more difficult to score)

coordinates.name: Attacking area, penalty box
coordinates.description: In the penalty box, facing the goal directly

coordinates.name: Penalty box corner area
coordinates.description: Area in the penalty box, facing the goal diagonally

actions.name: High ball
actions.description: Near pass, with ball significantly off the ground

actions.name: Bounce off
actions.description: Pseudo-action; placeholder for when a ball is bounced off a player simulating an actual action

actions.name: Move
actions.description: When moving with the ball; all actions imply ball playing

actions.name: Pass
actions.description: The usual, normal, mostly boring pass

actions.name: Dribble
actions.description: Dribbling; contrast with Move where for example the player moves into empty space

actions.name: Forward pass
actions.description: A direct low pass forward, which typically creates an attacking advantage, if successful

actions.name: Pivot
actions.description: Turning with the back to the goal

actions.name: Shoot
actions.description: Shoot; any attempt at goal including headers. To distinguish between attempts, special coordinates are used

actions.name: Hold ball
actions.description: Applies to outfield players, so not literally holding. The next expected state should be ball loss or ball out of play

actions.name: Swap wings
actions.description: Long pass from one wing to the other (without aiming the ball significantly forward)
